item.description:
SATURDAY October 16 at 8 pm

Enjoy a great night of Friends and Theatre - at a discounted price!

Driving Miss Daisy

By Alfred Uhry

This graceful, moving drama by Alfred Uhry .
Affectionately covers the twenty five year relationship between a wealthy, strong willed Southern matron and her equally indomitable black chauffeur, Hoke. A delicate, funny and bittersweet story.

Enjoy a great night of Friends and Theatre - at a discounted price!

Tickets are $38

Get your Advance Tickets at the 20% CT Theatre Group Discount - Only $31.50

Pick Up Your Tickets at Pre-Party or at the Will Call Window

Ruby Tuesday of Cromwell
50 SHUNPIKE ROAD
CROMWELL CT 06416
860-635-9970

Located in KMart and Rookies Plaza

The CT Theatre Group has a very limited number of discounted tickets

THIS SHOW WILL SELL OUT Reserve your seat while tickets remain

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
